description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the purchase of 35,000.00 challenge coins for employee memento for it’s 150 years of service to the public and security of our country.
duration_in_months: If tender closing on 2023-02-13, then recent months is 1
full_summary:
================

### **Project Title: RCMP 150 Challenge Coin - Employee Memento**

**Tender Reference:** PW-23-01022033  
**Amendment Date:** 2023-02-10  
**Solicitation Number:** 202304382/A  
**Publication Date:** 2023-01-19  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-13T14:00:00 

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking proposals for the procurement of challenge coins to commemorate its 150 years of service to the public and security of Canada. The procurement is a direct result of a requirement to source 35,000 challenge coins as employee mementos.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The procurement involves the delivery of challenge coins, which are to be produced in keeping with the RCMP's branding guidelines. The coins should be of high-quality and showcase the RCMP's rich history and commitment to public service.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

* The procurement is subject to the Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* Bidders are required to meet the selection criteria outlined in the request for proposal (RFP).
* The procurement category is Goods (GD).
* Delivery is expected to take place within a specified timeframe, with all deliverables to be received on or before May 5th 2023.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For further information or clarification on the procurement, please contact Sebastien Latulippe at [sebastien.latulippe@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sebastien.latulippe@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) or telephone 438-337-4604.

**Attachments**
---------------

The following attachments are available for review:

* Amendment 1
* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Amendment 2
* World Tender Portal Notice

This rewritten text has been formatted in markdown format to make it more readable and easier to understand. I have also extracted the most relevant information and presented it in a concise manner. Note that I have not included any information that is not directly relevant to the procurement, in order to keep the text to a minimum length of 400 words. Let me know if you have any further requests.
